definition: A period of time during the year when schools are closed and students have a break from their regular academic studies. It typically occurs during the warmer months and is commonly associated with travel, relaxation, and recreational activities.

examples.german: Ich gehe in den Sommerferien ans Meer.
examples.english: I am going to the beach during the summer holidays.
The summer holidays last for six weeks.

examples.german: Wir verbringen die Sommerferien in den Bergen.
examples.english: We are spending the summer holidays in the mountains.

examples.german: Die Sommerferien sind meine Lieblingszeit im Jahr.
examples.english: The summer holidays are my favorite time of the year.
